02ac7b80-daa1-4066-931a-ccd8e8a0c761.name: host_name
02ac7b80-daa1-4066-931a-ccd8e8a0c761.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'host_name') as host_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name like 'cassandra%'
GROUP BY host_name
